sentences.en: Experts of human body cryogenics believe that they will soon find a way to immortality.
sentences.cn: 信仰人体冷冻学的专家相信他们即将找到不朽之道.

sentences.en: Humans vying for dominance will turn to genetics and cryogenics to compete.
sentences.cn: 为主宰世界而竞争的人将转向在遗传学和低温学领域展开竞争.

sentences.en: If cryogenics were all free, then you could live like Walt Disney and live for all eternity inside a block of ice.
sentences.cn: 如果低温冷冻是免费的，那么你会像华尔特•迪斯尼一样生活并在一大块冰内永生。

sentences.en: More than four million samples will be preserved near the North Pole without the need for expensive cryogenics (see
sentences.cn: 超过400万份种子保存在了北极附近，而不需要昂贵的低温保存（见  全球种子库在挪威开放）。

sentences.en: More than four million samples will be preserved near the North Pole without the need for expensive cryogenics (see Global seed vault opens in Norway).
sentences.cn: 超过400万份种子保存在了北极附近，而不需要昂贵的低温保存（见  全球种子库在挪威开放）。

sentences.en: Ph . D . and MSc. Degrees awarded at Institute of Cryogenics, University of Southampton, U . K.
sentences.cn: 1984英国南安普敦大学低温研究所留学,获英国理学硕士、 博士 学位.

sentences.en: Taught in the speciality of Refrigeration & Cryogenics. The professional titles are: associate professor ( 1985 - 1992 ) .
sentences.cn: 1992 在西安交通大学能源与动力工程学院制冷 与 低温工程专业副教授.

sentences.en: Their very low boiling and melting points make them refrigerants for low - temperature research ( see cryogenics ) .
sentences.cn: 它们的沸点和熔点都非常低,因而可以在低温研究中用作致 冷剂.

sentences.en: This Dextran has a variety of uses, from cryogenics to analytical standards in GPC.
sentences.cn: 这葡聚糖具有多种用途, 从低温到GPC的分析标准.

sentences.en: This is called cryogenics, and it has its drawbacks.
sentences.cn: 这就是低温生物学, 当然这办法也有点麻烦.

words.tran_cn: 冷冻的（副词cryogenically）；低温学的；低温实验法的
[外科] 冷冻手术；[外科] 低温外科（等于cryogenic surgery）

trans.tran_en: the scientific study of very low temperatures
